actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide a process to lock and suspend domain names used to facilitate the online sale of controlled substances illegally, and for other purposes.
short_title: Stop Illegal Online Sales of Controlled Substances Act

summary.text:
Stop Illegal Online Sales of Controlled Substances Act

This bill requires registry operators or registrars of internet domain names to suspend domain names that are used for the illegal sale of controlled substances, upon notification from specified federal or state regulatory agencies.

titles.title: Stop Illegal Online Sales of Controlled Substances Act
Stop Illegal Online Sales of Controlled Substances Act
A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide a process to lock and suspend domain names used to facilitate the online sale of controlled substances illegally, and for other purposes.
